refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -n ;;;no audio out </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ;example by joachim heintz sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; "fox.ats" has been created by ATSanal Sfile = "fox.ats" isr ATSinfo Sfile, 0 ifs ATSinfo Sfile, 1 iws ATSinfo Sfile, 2 inp ATSinfo Sfile, 3 inf ATSinfo Sfile, 4 ima ATSinfo Sfile, 5 imf ATSinfo Sfile, 6 id ATSinfo Sfile, 7 ift ATSinfo Sfile, 8 prints {{ Sample rate = %d Hz Frame Size = %d samples Window Size = %d samples Number of Partials = %d Number of Frames = %d Maximum Amplitude = %f Maximum Frequency = %f Hz Duration = %f seconds ATS file Type = %d }}, isr, ifs, iws, inp, inf, ima, imf, id, ift endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> i 1 0 0 </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
